name: RPG_V0
description:
This game is an RPG. This was a pico 8 school project that I completed in 1 week. I hope you will like it and enjoy it.

The keys :

- e = quest menu 

-⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ = to move 

-❎ + 🅾️ = inventory menu 

-❎ = interact

- in inventory: 

-⬅️⬆️: move 

-⬇️: select an object 

-➡️: exit inventory 

Tips : 

-fight with the boss: 

 during the fight with the boss you will have to use magic at the top left is displayed the button to press, and just below the count of the good touches, you need a certain account good touch to hurt the boss!!!
